newsitem.title: COTE D'IVOIRE: Ivory Coast 96/97 farm-gate cocoa price unchanged.
newsitem.headline: Ivory Coast 96/97 farm-gate cocoa price unchanged.

text.p: Ivory Coast begins its 1996/97 cocoa marketing campaign on Thursday with the farm-gate price remaining unchanged at 320 CFA francs per kilo, Agriculture Minister Lambert Kouassi Konan said on Wednesday.
"The 1995/96 cocoa campaign ends today October 23," he told a news conference. "The 1996/97 campaign begins Thursday October 24."
Kouassi Konan said the 320 CFA franc per kilo price for cocoa included five cents for the sack, the same as last year.
He said the government had approved without amendment a decision taken by the Caisse de Stabiliastion marketing board on the campaign.
Noting that the 1995/96 campaign was ending on Wednesday, he added: "As a result, remaining stocks must be declared to the Caistab."
